LF Beetz

Small Speaker. Big Sound.

About our product

LF Beetz is a company based out of Lake Forest, IL. We are retailers of the acclaimed LF Beetz speaker. Our company is a rare breed. With cohesive cooperation between every department, from sales to human resources, LF Beetz is able to provide customers with the resources of a large company, but the attention of a small one.

About our company

LF Beetz is a company whose goal it is to deliver big sound in a small, compact package. The LF Beetz speaker is the most versatile pocket-sized speaker out there. Not only only does its sound blow away that which comes from your phone's built in speakers, but it can also act as a remote shutter. This means you can set your phone down, and use your LF Beetz speaker to take a photo when you're ready, and not rely on a timer or another person who is then left out of the photo.
